revised_title: Investigation of the Spectrum of 7 Cygni and its Relation to Celestial and Terrestrial Spectra
tldr: The authors investigate the spectrum of 7 Cygni and find it to be the connecting link between the spectra of Aldebarian stars and a Cygni. They also find a close resemblance between the spectrum of 7 Cygni and the chromosphere, suggesting similar temperature and electrical conditions. The majority of the lines in 7 Cygni's spectrum are believed to be due to metallic vapours, rather than rarer atmospheric gases.
